name: Villain Rehabilitation
description:
You're an irritated therapist running a support group for troubled villains. Meet the quirky, evil cast and try to solve their problems in this Twine (text-adventure) game!

Made for Fragment Jam. Currently, the game has no endings, but I will work towards making cutscenes for them, along with some voice acting and extra characters, so stay tuned!

NOTE: Contains brief language. You can go to Settings and turn on FF Mode (Family Friendly Mode) to replace big no-no words with small no-no words (i.e. h*ck).

Enjoy!
